Text: Altra ICE access Cc my voice mail yesterday EES is interested in having access to the IntercontinentalExchange ICE and Altrade Electronic Brokering System for power EES would really need only readonly access as all trades would continue to be conducted through ENA or EPMI I believe the ICE agreement with ENA allows this type of access by affiliates although we likely need to obtain additional user licenses I do not know whether the Altra agreement with ENA would allow for EES to access the Altrade system I think it would be preferable for EES to be able to access the systems under the current ENA agreements rather than entering into their own agreements given that ENA will continue to be the trading party Thoughts Could you please advise as to how EES can get the access it needs Thanks Elisa Donovan EES Legal Ph
